participant_1.background:
I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious.
My dog is my best friend now that my cat passed away.
i don t like waking up early.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

participant_2.background:
I bought a new monitor because my old one was too small.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.

content.text: I'm doing okay! Just working on a few projects. What about you?
Not much, just hanging out with my dog. He's my best friend now that my cat passed away.
Aww, I'm sorry to hear about your cat. I love dogs too! I wish I could bring mine with me on all my travels.
Me too! My dog is like my best friend. He always makes me feel better when I'm feeling down.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you have him. What kind of dog is he?
He's a golden retriever! He's the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are the best! They're so friendly and loving.
What are some of your favorite things to do with your dog?
We love to go for walks in the park, play fetch, and cuddle up on the couch.
Those sound like so much fun! I love cuddling up with my dog too.
Me too! He's the best cuddler.
I'm glad you have such a great dog to keep you company
